Sea of Myrth07238i6bhvmgkj7alotthys3junqb5s8v48n1784792015-03-22T03:03:35ZThe Dragon Demands5014364[[Image:Sea of Myrth.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of the Sea of Myrth off the coast of Essos.]]
The '''Sea of Myrth''' is a large inlet of the [[Narrow Sea]], located in south-western [[Essos]] where it separates the [[Disputed Lands]] from the lands further north. The [[Free City]] of [[Myr]] lies on the eastern coast of the Sea of Myrth, while [[Tyrosh]] lies on an island at the mouth of the sea.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/myr/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Myr entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Sea of Myrth is in the same location.
